ResearchProjectDef.label: mech research mode
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use the <color=#00cccc>"Hive mind research"</color> mode. In this mode, mechanoids generate research points.

ResearchProjectDef.label: combat modes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use the <color=#00cccc>"Find and destroy"</color> mode. In this mode, mechanoids hunt all enemies present on the map.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced combat modes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use the <color=#00cccc>"Wait enemy"</color> mode. In this mode, mechanoids will shutdown and wait for the enemy, and when it appears, it will wake up and head towards the target.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced work modes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use the <color=#00cccc>"Work and recharge"</color> mode. In this mode, mechanoids will charge as needed before shutting down.

ResearchProjectDef.label: safe modes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use the <color=#00cccc>"Safe yourself"</color> mode. In this mode, mechanoids will defend themselves and retreat as necessary.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced escort modes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use the <color=#00cccc>"Wait enemy"</color> mode. In this mode, mechanoids will shutdown and wait for the enemy, and when it appears, it will wake up and head towards the target.
